medical_history.chief_complaint: Right lower quadrant pain and nausea for 24 hours.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain began 24 hours ago and has progressively worsened. The patient has never experienced this type of pain before. Symptoms are associated with nausea, but the patient denies emesis, diarrhea, or constipation. No fevers or chills noted.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Goiter status post-resection; previous nosebleeds with packing; past surgical history includes tubal ligation and thyroid surgery.
